dict.acceptation: 查明，发现；洞察；侦察，侦查；[电子学]检波；

sent.orig: For instance, electrocardiograph can detect heart's condition. Electroencephalograph can detect brain's condition.
sent.trans: 例如，心电图仪可查抄人的心脏状态，脑电图仪可查抄人的前脑状态。

sent.orig: Hardware auto-detect: Automatically detect your hardware and decide the best converting speed.
sent.trans: 硬件的自动检测：自动检测您的硬件，并决定最好的转换速度。

sent.orig: The experimental results show that the method can detect the whole motion object from image sequence.
sent.trans: 实验表明，该方法可有效地从图像序列中检测出完整的运动目标。

sent.orig: Database integrity tests can detect inconsistencies caused by hardware or software errors.
sent.trans: 数据库完整性测试可以检测到由于硬件或软件错误而导致的不一致。

sent.orig: In the paper, Hu's invariants are used to detect the pipe and it achieves high rate.
sent.trans: 本文把Hu不变矩应用于类圆的检测中，提高了识别的准确性，速度也较快。
